EmailTemplate.description: Now live in New York email to partners
EmailTemplate.name: 18-0111 NY Launch Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Now LIVE in New York
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
BlueWave is now accepting partner applications in New York State!
Why Solar Contractors Choose our Residential Loan Platform:
Speedy disbursal schedules to improve dealer cash flow Individual incentives for sales reps based on loan volume Seamless online loan approval for customers, up to $100,000 No bridge loan needed due to low introductory monthly payments We are a B-Corp, meaning we are dedicated to the people and places we serve A history of developing over 100MW of solar projects ourselves
Interested? Please contact our New York Business Development Manager, George Wissing (917) 439-8982.
